==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|か|ぶ|き|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
The nominalized form of the verb {{m|ja|傾く|tr=kabuku||to tilt, lean}}. The kanji literally mean "song, dance, and skill", but are [[w:Ateji|ateji]] and not etymologically related.

===Pronunciation===
